title: Patch Notes
content: with Minthara the night of the celebration at camp. Fixed your weapon appearing mid-dialogue when talking to Rolan at the Emerald Grove. Fixed the Dream Guardian's leg getting all jittery when they kneel down to let you stab them. The facade of stoicism breaks a little when you can see their legs turn to jelly. Fixed the scared boar in Act I looking like it's running into a rock. Fixed a pop and an awkward pause in Astarion's recruitment dialogue. Fixed player characters turning around a little
